short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove any mention of 'natural disaster' from any webpage and replace with '#NoNaturalDisaster'. Developed by DRR Dynamics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those fed up with seeing natural disaster mentioned in text online.  Replace it with the hashtag #NoNaturalDisaster

Developed by Kevin at DRR Dynamics (www.drrd.org.uk)
